00021 //---------------------------------------------------------
00022 //   InstrumentTemplate
00023 //---------------------------------------------------------
00024 
00025 struct InstrumentTemplate {
00026       QString group;
00027       QString name;           // also used for track name
00028       QString shortName;
00029       int staves;      // 1 <= MAX_STAVES
00030       int clefIdx[MAX_STAVES];
00031       int midiProgram;
00032       int minPitch;
00033       int maxPitch;
00034 
00035       InstrumentTemplate(const QString& group, const QString& name, const QString& sn,
00036          int, const int*);
00037       };
00038 
00039 typedef std::list<InstrumentTemplate> InstrumentTemplateList;
00040 typedef InstrumentTemplateList::const_iterator ciInstrumentTemplate;

00085 enum { ITEM_KEEP, ITEM_DELETE, ITEM_ADD };
00086 enum { PART_LIST_ITEM = 1000, STAFF_LIST_ITEM = 1001 };

00088 //---------------------------------------------------------
00089 //   PartListItem
00090 //---------------------------------------------------------
00091 
00092 class PartListItem : public Q3ListViewItem {
00093       virtual void paintCell(QPainter*, const QColorGroup&, int, int, int);
00094 
00095    public:
00096       int op;
00097       Part* part;
00098       const InstrumentTemplate* it;
00099 
00100       PartListItem(Part* p, Q3ListView* lv)
00101          : Q3ListViewItem(lv) {
00102             part = p;
00103             it   = 0;
00104             op   = ITEM_KEEP;
00105             }
00106       PartListItem(const InstrumentTemplate* i, Q3ListView* lv)
00107          : Q3ListViewItem(lv) {
00108             part = 0;
00109             it   = i;
00110             op   = ITEM_ADD;
00111             }
00112       virtual QString text(int col) const;
00113       virtual int rtti() const { return PART_LIST_ITEM; }
00114       };
